mapper.select: SELECT nvl(COUNT(*), 0) FROM board WHERE pmboardid = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pmboard values (pmboardseq.nextval, #{pmname}, #{pmpass}, #{subject}, #{pmcontent}, #{pmfile1}, sysdate, 0, pmboardseq.currval, #{reflevel}, #{refstep}, #{pmboardid})
mapper.update: UPDATE pmboard SET readcnt = readcnt + 1 WHERE num = #{value}
UPDATE pmboard SET refstep = refstep + 1 WHERE ref = #{ref} AND refstep > #{refstep}
UPDATE pmboard SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, file1 = #{file1} WHERE num = #{num}
